attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Living near a large supermarket chain the amount of supermaket trolleys abandoned in the streets has increased and Tescos are doing nothing to stop the trolleys leaving their premises.
I think there should be an "On the Spot" fine for anyone seen pushing a Supermarket trolley out of the premises of the store. Cars are being damaged and they are truely a menace to local residents.
Please sign the petition to allow the Police and their PCSO's to act more severely to stop this growing trend.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
